attributes.additional_details:
Planning application P/14/1833/2

West of Loughborough Development

By entering my name and address below, I acknowledge as a resident of Charnwood Borough, my objection to the destruction of the Green Wedge between Shepshed, Hathern and Loughborough by building several thousand houses and associated infrastructure on the Garendon Estate, as proposed in the CBC draft Core Strategy. I also object to a proposed road through the Estate and the listed Garendon Park. I support the efforts of the Garendon Park & Countryside Protection Group to prevent environment degradation that would inevitably result from implementation of the Core Strategy
